data.name: DreamIsland
data.detailed_description:
~No.0 The Guiding Fairy

"I need you to collect "50 kinds" of cards that can be obtained by solving the problems of the inhabitants of the dream world.

What? Suddenly?

Once the card is activated, you cannot return to the world until the conditions are met.

In other words, you need to collect 50 cards before you can return to your world.

We're about to enter the dream world!

When you arrive, head to Term Town. There you will find a clue that will help you get the first card.


The first card is in Termtown.

DREAM ISLAND" is an open world 3D game.
Collect 50 different cards and discover the legends and truths of the "Dream World".

As you collect cards, the main story progresses.
Legends of the dream world, the identity of the legendary "Dream Master", the truth about the island-destroying "Dream Devil",
And what is the dream world?
All will be revealed only to the player who has collected all the cards.

An RPG with a completely original story that you can enjoy as if you were reading a book.
Let's go on an adventure to your own dream world!

◆Control Methods

You can change your viewpoint with the mouse

W or up cursor - go forward
A or left cursor - go left
S or down cursor - move backward
D or right cursor - go right
Space" - jump
F" - View conversation, bulletin board
B" - Open binder
M" → open map

(*) Save & Load is done automatically

data.short_description: This game is an action exploration game where you complete various missions and collect 51 cards. The map is an open world, and you'll have to solve people's problems and unravel the mysteries of the world from a vast map!
